text: Nodeul Station is a train station of Seoul Subway Line 9, located in Dongjak District, Seoul, South Korea. == Origin of staton name == Originally, the name "Nodeul" means "The stepping stone that Egret playing with", and now it means the area near Noryangjin(Which is a hanja translation from Nodeul). == History == * September 18, 2008 : Station name decidedSeoul Announcements 2008-317 , 2008-9-18. * July 24, 2009 : Opened with opening ofSeoul Subway Line 9 Gaehwa - Sinnonhyeon == Station structure == Station has 2 side platforms, 2 tracks. === Platform === Noryangjin ↑ Down Up ↓ Heukseok Upward For Gimpo International AirportGaehwa Downward For SinnonhyeonSports Complex == Passenger count == Line People per day (people/day) References 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 Line 9 Get on 3,024 3,486 3,942 4,636 4,960 5,084 4,913 Line 9 Get off 2,472 2,852 3,195 3,809 4,172 4,289 4,128 == References == == Other websites == Category:Railway stations in South Korea
title: Nodeul Station
